rat:RedSneckoSkull.NAME: Red Snecko Skull
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yBleeding, apply #b1 additional stack of #yBleeding.

rat:QuicksilverSash.NAME: Quicksilver Sash
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you proc #ySilvered, remove ALL of your debuffs.

rat:BigChungusPlushie.NAME: Big Chungus Plushie
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b4 #yStrength and become #ySlowed.

rat:DefectSkillbook.NAME: Defect Skillbook
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b4 Orb slots and channel #b2 #yLightning and #b2 #yFrost.

rat:IroncladSkillbook.NAME: Ironclad Skillbook
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn gain #b1 #yStrength. At the end of combat, heal #b6 HP.

rat:SilentSkillbook.NAME: Silent Skillbook
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat draw #b2 cards. Whenever you deal unblocked damage to an enemy, apply #b1 #yPoison. Apply #b1 #yPoison to all enemies at the end of your turn.

rat:SilverFlask.NAME: Silver Flask
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] and at the start of your turn. Every other time you shuffle your deck, become #ySilvered.

rat:KircheisShard.NAME: Kircheis Shard
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b5 Skills, your next attack will deal #b6 bonus damage.

rat:ZhonyasHourglass.NAME: Zhonya's Hourglass
DESCRIPTIONS: Usable once per combat. Usable only if you haven't played any cards this turn. Become #yIntangible and #yEntangled.

rat:PhantomDancer.NAME: Phantom Dancer
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b3 Attacks in a single turn, gain #b1 #yBlur.
